CBallJack.cpp

00001 // ai for the ball and the jack in ep3
00002 #include "CBallJack.h"
00003 #include "../../spritedefines.h"
00004 
00005 #define BALL_SPEED      120
00006 #define JACK_SPEED      120
00007 #define JACK_ANIM_RATE  12
00008 
00009 #define BALLPUSHAMOUNT 30
00010 
00011 char BJ_BlockedD(int o);
00012 
00013 unsigned int rnd(void);

00015 CBallJack::CBallJack(CMap *pmap, Uint32 x, Uint32 y,
00016   std::vector<CPlayer> &PlayerVect, object_t type):
00017 CObject(pmap, x, y, type),
00018 m_Player(PlayerVect)
00019 {
00020  unsigned int px = m_Player.at(0).getXMidPos();
00021  unsigned int py = m_Player.at(0).getYMidPos();
00022 
00023  char tempxdir, tempydir;
00024  if(px<getXMidPos()) tempxdir=LEFT;
00025  else tempxdir = RIGHT;
00026 
00027  if(py<getYMidPos()) tempydir=UP;
00028  else tempydir = DOWN;
00029 
00030  if (tempxdir == LEFT && tempydir == UP) m_Direction = DUPLEFT;
00031  else if (tempxdir == RIGHT && tempydir == UP) m_Direction = DUPRIGHT;
00032  else if (tempxdir == LEFT && tempydir == DOWN) m_Direction = DDOWNLEFT;
00033  else if (tempxdir == RIGHT && tempydir == DOWN) m_Direction = DDOWNRIGHT;
00034 
00035  animframe = 0;
00036  animtimer = 0;
00037  inhibitfall = 1;
00038 
00039  if (m_type==OBJ_BALL)
00040  {
00041   speed = BALL_SPEED;
00042   canbezapped = 1;
00043  }
00044  else
00045  {
00046   speed = JACK_SPEED;
00047   canbezapped = 0;
00048  }
00049  performCollisions();
00050 }
00051 
00052 void CBallJack::process()
00053 {
00054  if (touchPlayer)
00055  {
00056   if (m_type==OBJ_BALL)
00057   {
00058    if (m_Player[touchedBy].getXPosition() < getXLeftPos())
00059    {
00060     m_Player[touchedBy].push(*this);
00061    }
00062    else
00063    {
00064     m_Player[touchedBy].push(*this);
00065    }
00066 
00067    switch(m_Direction)
00068    {
00069    case DUPRIGHT: m_Direction = DUPLEFT; break;
00070    case DUPLEFT: m_Direction = DUPRIGHT; break;
00071    case DDOWNRIGHT: m_Direction = DDOWNLEFT; break;
00072    case DDOWNLEFT: m_Direction = DDOWNRIGHT; break;
00073    default: break;
00074    }
00075   }
00076   else m_Player[touchedBy].kill();
00077  }
00078 
00079  switch(m_Direction)
00080  {
00081  case DUPLEFT:
00082   if (blockedu) { m_Direction = DDOWNLEFT; }
00083   else moveUp(speed);
00084 
00085   if (blockedl) { m_Direction = DUPRIGHT; }
00086   else moveLeft(speed);
00087   break;
00088  case DUPRIGHT:
00089   if (blockedu) { m_Direction = DDOWNRIGHT; }
00090   else moveUp(speed);
00091 
00092   if (blockedr) { m_Direction = DUPLEFT; }
00093   else moveRight(speed);
00094   break;
00095  case DDOWNLEFT:
00096   if (blockedd) { m_Direction = DUPLEFT; }
00097   else moveDown(speed);
00098 
00099   if (blockedl) { m_Direction = DDOWNRIGHT; }
00100   else moveLeft(speed);
00101   break;
00102  case DDOWNRIGHT:
00103   if (blockedd) { m_Direction = DUPRIGHT; }
00104   else moveDown(speed);
00105 
00106   if (blockedr) { m_Direction = DDOWNLEFT; }
00107   else moveRight(speed);
00108   break;
00109  default: break;
00110  }
00111 
00112  if (m_type==OBJ_BALL)
00113  {
00114   sprite = OBJ_BALL_DEFSPRITE;
00115  }
00116  else
00117  {
00118   sprite = OBJ_JACK_DEFSPRITE + animframe;
00119   if (animtimer > JACK_ANIM_RATE)
00120   {
00121    animframe++;
00122    if (animframe>3) animframe=0;
00123    animtimer = 0;
00124   }
00125   else animtimer++;
00126  }
00127 }
00128 
00129 void CBallJack::getShotByRay()
00130 {
00131  // have ball change direction when zapped
00132  if (zapd==LEFT)
00133  {
00134   switch(m_Direction)
00135   {
00136   case DUPRIGHT: m_Direction = DUPLEFT; break;
00137   case DDOWNRIGHT: m_Direction = DDOWNLEFT; break;
00138   }
00139  }
00140  else
00141  {
00142   switch(m_Direction)
00143   {
00144   case DUPLEFT: m_Direction = DUPRIGHT; break;
00145   case DDOWNLEFT: m_Direction = DDOWNRIGHT; break;
00146   }
00147  }
00148 }
